description: A React functional component called ChatInput that provides a contentEditable input area supporting tagging (@ and #), handling tag suggestions, insertion, and message sending in a chat application.

methods.name: ChatInput
methods.description: Main React functional component rendering a contenteditable input with tagging support and send button.
